wyapruthi 424 k kriyathmaka karamin janatha subasetha sandaha waya kala ee athimahath mudal pramanaya kagalla disa prajawage saukhyaya nanwima aramunu kota sidu wuwaki.2006 wasare wyapruthi 145 k da, 2007 wasare wyapruthi 79 k da, 2008 wasare wyapruthi 85 k da, 2009 wasare wyapruthi 115 k da lesa sidukeruna ema kriyadamayan sandaha 2006 wasare di rupiyal miliyana 68.945 k da, 2007 wasare di rupiyal miliyana 23.10 k da, 2008 wasare di rupiyal miliyana 47.20 k da, 2009 wasare di rupiyal miliyana 20.84 k da lesa rajaya prathipadana laba di thibe.gamata widuliyawiduli awashyatha sapayima nagarika janathawa men ma gramiya janathawageda subasetha sandaha mulika awashyathawak we.
